title: SWP Spec Kit (SlimWire Protocol): Core Spec, Conformance Vectors, and Go PoC
description: SWP Spec Kit contains the SlimWire Protocol (SWP) core framing and envelope specification, encoding and security bindings, profile documents, conformance vectors, and a Go reference implementation with a spec-vector runner.
notes: Release metadata is managed through GitHub releases and archived by Zenodo. Add an SPDX license field after a repository LICENSE file is finalized.
